131.content:
Kamui has had enough with Nagisa. She was always following him around when possible and claiming to be his girlfriend. Usually, this would be nice for most boys, but Kamui in fact didn't love Nagisa at all. She wouldn't believe him even though he said it many times, so Kamui had the worst plan to stop Nagisa from liking him ever again.
All day, Kamui had been filling himself up with beans, milk, cabbages, and spicy foods. When his parents asked why, he just said that he was hungry. Today, Kamui had invited Nagisa to his house. Sure, if she knew his address, she would stalk him everyday, but if this plan works, Nagisa will probably never even talk with him ever again. Kamui startled as the doorbell rang. He opened the door to have a smiling Nagisa pounce on him, like usual. "Oh Kamui, my boyfriend, did you invite me to your house so you could ask me to marry you?", a hopeful Nagisa asked. "No, of course not!" Kamui answered coldly, "I just invited you here to show you something special..." Kamui smiled deviously as he led his "lover" up the stairs. "Oh Kamui, did you bring me to your bedroom so we could do... That?" Nagisa asked while blushing. Kamui was confused at first but after a few seconds, he realized what she meant. "What!? O-of course not!" Kamui screamed, blushing too, "But if you get on my bed, I'll show you something..." "Ooooh! Kamui-san~!" Nagisa squealed while blushing, "Okay, I'll do it." Nagisa lied down on Kamui's bed, eyes closed, expecting Kamui to kiss her. Kamui sees this as his chance, as he pulled down his pants and underwear, and got on the bed, with legs spread to both sides of Nagisa's body. She could feel his body weight on the bed, and that he was starting to bend down. Nagisa pursed her lips, as Kamui's lips touched hers! Nagisa screamed wildly inside, but she opened her eyes not to see Kamui's eyes, but darkness. What could this mean? The question was answered when a warm wind came out of Kamui's mouth into Nagisa's. The wind was smelly, and it tasted awful. Then she realized, she was kissing Kamui's butthole! Nagisa started to cough and struggle relentlessly, but the boy managed to control her by just sitting on her head. "Did you like the kiss?" Kamui said sarcastically while laughing. Then, he blasts a wet one in her mouth, giving her a taste of his insides. Nagisa coughed profusely, trying to get rid of the awful taste, but to no avail. Kamui decided to take it to the next level by...
131.title: Nagisa

14.content:
Welcome to the Alternate Modes section! In this section, you can choose different modes that make female character(s) of Vanguard suffer to the horrible smells of gas! Right now we have a limited amount of options, but you can contribute by emailing me some more ideas!
These are the modes available:
Gang-Fart: A group of characters torture a female character.
Trap Room: A group of female characters get trapped in a small space while at least one of them farts uncontrollably.
Trap Room - Male: The same, but with one male character, and he must be the farter.
Crossover: A character from a different game/anime/manga/etc. comes to the Cardfight!! Vanguard world and farts on one of the characters.
What will your choice be?
14.title: Alternate Modes

14521211.content:
"Oh man... I'm not feeling very well..."
The cyborg boy, Child Frank, held his stomach in pain while lying on his bed in his quarters. His mechanical parts causes him to digest food in a bit different way than normal boys, and it can turn out to be quite troublesome.
"If I gas up the ship again, I would probably get beaten..."
The boy relived the last time he passed gas on the ship. The entire crew went on high alert, thinking that they were under attack from a poisonous gas of some kind. The smell was enough to wake the dead, technically speaking.
Then he got an idea. He rushed out of his cabin and into the hold.
A single girl was lying on the floor. She was a small girl, with light blue hair in twintails, a navy shirt and a miniskirt. She was "Astraea", as his seniors has mentioned. She was the captive that they successfully captured while raiding an Aqua Force outpost.
Frank closed the door behind him, not wanting anyone to spot him here in the night. He walked to the cadet, who woke up at the sound of him approaching.
"W-what do you want?"
"Er... Don't mind me, I'm just going to..."
"Mmph!"
The cadet tried to scream as the boy sat down on her face. Frank figured this would be the best way to rid of his gas; to pump it all in the captive.
"Sorry, but I can't have my seniors smelling this..."
BBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRAPPPT!
A terrible stench hits Astraea's nostrils. It was so horrible that she truly thought that the boy was sent here to execute her like this. Unfortunately for her, sweet release wouldn't be an option for her right now.
A growl warns her of another dreadful attack...
14521211.title: Officer Cadet, Astraea

14522.content: Since I can't imagine any character who would fart on units... Will you fart on them?
14522.title: Characters farting on Units

choices: Yes, I'm shaking to torture some mermaids!
145221.content:
You grinned as you finally did it. You opened the gateway to Cray. It took you months of trial and error in your little apartment, but you were now able to go to Cray.
Now, most Vanguard Fighters would go to Cray to visit their favorite units or maybe see the beautiful atmosphere of the planet. That was why you were going too, right? Wrong. The reason you were going to Cray was that it wasn't your world. You could do anything there and if you did it carefully enough, you won't get caught. You were going to release the demon inside you; the demon that wanted living toilets. That sounded sick, but it was you, and there was no stopping you now. As you stepped into the portal, you thought about who your first target would be...
The clan that came to mind was the Bermuda Triangle. They were a clan full of girls! They were your perfect targets, but the problem was they were all under the sea. Never mind that, if you wanted them, then you will get them. But did you truly want those mermaids though?
145221.title: Me!

1452211.content: After a bit of research, you found out that a group of mermaid idols have assumed human form and came ashore. How foolish of them. This will definitely be their last vacation, after you finish what you're going to do to them. But, who'll be your first victim?

1452211222.content: How about one of the new mermaids, the airhead "Strolling Weather, Emilia"?

14522112221.content:
Now you've just arrived on Cray for a few days, and you were still planning and weren't trying to do anything yet, but you were lucky. You were staying in a hotel near the seas of Magallanica. One of the bellboys came to ask if it was okay if you could share the room with another guest. The guest happened to be one of the rising stars of the Bermuda Triangle, Emilia. You realized how lucky you were and agreed almost immediately.
Then, a bit after sunset, there was a knock at the door. You opened it to find the cute white-haired girl with a small travel bag in her hands. "H-hi," she stuttered, "I-I'm Emilia..." "Come on in," you moved to let her walk in.
"So..." you asked curiously, "Why are you staying here?" "Well..." she started before trailing off for a moment, "I was told to come here for a shooting, and they recommended this hotel, but when I booked a room they said it was full, but I didn't know where else to go, so I said okay I could share a room, and then this morning I had to take the medicine for us mermaids to get legs, but I couldn't find it, and..." She kept talking and talking and you were starting to get annoyed. You feel your stomach growl quietly as you get an idea. You lifted your right leg and let out a monster.
PPPPPPRRRRRRRAAAAAABBBBBBBBTTTTTTTTT!
Emilia stopped for a moment, shocked. "Uh..." she said with a shocked expression, "Was that, a f-fart?" "Sorry, I'm kinda gassy sometimes," you said while smiling sheepishly. More like, all the time, you thought. Then the smell hit her. "Ughhh... Stinkyyyy!" she complained while covering her nose. "Sorry!" you said while grinning as you started to plot something foul for her. But how will it go start?
14522112221.title: Strolling Weather, Emilia

145221122211.content:
After a while, Emilia decided to go take a shower. This was it. You had to act now. You set up a simple trap to make her trip and fall when she walks out of the bathroom. After that... Well, you know how it goes.
"Ahhh..." you hear her as she walks out of the bathroom, "That was refresh- oh!" She trips over your rope, but her face didn't smash into the floor. It was cushioned by your old underwear. "Ewww!" she exclaimed as she sat up, "What's th- Mmm!" You interrupted her by pushing her to the ground with your butt. "Well, I thought I'd let you know me well first, so we can become good roommates!" you laughed as a short fart was let loose.
PRRBBTT!
Emilia struggled harder than before, but you were still stronger than her. Even though it was a small fart, you could smell the rotten cabbage scent. "Like that?" you asked as Emilia coughed. "Well, have some more!"
Pssssssttttt...
An SBD slithered slowly through your pants and into her nostrils. She was starting to feel dizzy. She needed fresh air, but you weren't cutting her a break. The only thing you were cutting for her was...
PPPRRRRRAAAABBBBTTTT!
More sewer-like gas was pumped into her poor nose. You hear her breathing slower, and you know she's about to fall unconscious. Do yo finish her off?
145221122211.title: It's a trap!

1452212.content: You were a bad swimmer, so the idea of having one of those mermaids would need to rest for now. Just then, a single unit came to your mind. Her name was Maiden of Rainbow Wood. According to the lores you've read, she's "small enough to even hide under the shadow of a flower", so there's many things you could do to a fairy that small...
1452212.title: Maybe not...

choices: Give me some of those red wings!
14522122.content: How about the Crimson Nursewind? A group of elite red-winged angels from the clan "Angel Feather", consisting of "Crimson Heart, Nahas", "Crimson Mind, Baruch", "Crimson Drive, Aphrodite", and "Crimson Impact, Metatron".
14522122.title: I'm looking for someone else...

145221221.content:
You grinned at what you've accomplished. Four of the most elite angels on cray, bound and gagged, sitting on your floor. It was quite hard to sneak into the Angels' tower, but with help form some of your inventions, you were able to take the angels unnoticed.
You laughed as you take another bite out of your buffalo wings. "Guess these are the only red wings that could even hurt me a little," you mocked as you munched on your treat. "Ugh, all these buffalo wings I've been eating since morning is beginning to digest," you complained as your stomach gurgled. You moved in front of the smallest angel and crouched down.
BBBBBRRRRRAAAAAAPPPPTTTTTTT!!!
"NNNNHH!" the small angel tried to scream. The smell could kill a herd of buffaloes. Tears started to roll down her face as Nahas struggled to get fresh air behind your butt. The other angels weren't enjoying themselves either. "Come on, it's just farts," you said as you pushed the full weight of your butt onto Nahas' face, "Can it really hurt you that badly?"
Psssssttttt...
A silent but deadly slithered its way into Nahas' nostrils. You rubbed your butt against the crying angel's face to ensure she breathes in all the smell. When you were satisfied, you stood up and walked to your next target, leaving the small angel crying her heart out. She had never smelled anything as foul.
"How about you?" you asked Baruch, "What do you think of my farts?" She turned to you and gave a glare that could only mean 'Once I get out of here I'm going to beat the crap out of you'. No worries, she wouldn't be leaving soon. You pushed her down so that she was lying flat on the floor. Then, you stood over her for just a moment before your bare butt descended on her. She struggled with all her might, but only succeeded in burying her face deeper into your butt. "Smells good doesn't it?" you said as you rubbed your butt on her face, "Since you want it so much, I'll reward you-"
BRRPPPTTTT!
A short but thick fart lingered in Baruch's nostrils. She struggled even harder, but it was getting her nowhere. You then decide to...
145221221.title: Red Wings

During the first national tournament, Misaki had just lost to Asaka and after apologizing to her teammates, went to the toilet to hide. 1531.content: Emi Sendou woke up in a dark room. She was lying on an unfamiliar bed, and when she tried to get up, she noticed that she was tied to the bed. Emi started to get scared and struggled against her bindings. Just then, a door opened and light came in the room. She heard a flick and then the lights came on. The one at the door was Nagisa! "Nagisa! Are you here to help me?" Emi asked hopefully. "Ha! Help you? After what you've done?" an angry Nagisa replied. "W-what I've done? Whatever have I done, Nagisa?" Emi asked, frightened and confused. "You're taking away my Kamui!" Nagisa screamed as she puffed, "And now, I'm going to teach you a lesson, so that you know that Kamii is mine!" "W-wait, Nagisa! I never tried to take Kamui! I know that he's all yours!" Emi shouted, which is actually what she thought. "Hmph. Liars like you should only be living in one place." Nagisa said as she got on the bed, and sat her panty-clad butt on Emi's face! "H-hey! What are you doing!?" Emi screamed into Nagisa's butt as she rubbed it on the orange-haired girl's face. Then, Nagisa suddenly stopped rubbing, with her hole right on top of Emi's poor nose. "Now, it begins!" Nagisa announced as her stomach rumbled. Emi knew what was about to happen and struggled even more, burying her nose in Nagisa's covered butthole. Then the blonde ripped a fart that made a brown spot! "Ahh..." Nagisa moaned as she rubbed the stench on Emi's face, "I wonder how Kamui will like your new smell?" Emi coughed under the smaller girl's butt, feeling sick from the rank gas. She was about to pass out when...

15522.content:
"Untie me or you'll regret it!" the idol shouted as the Student Council Vice President locked the door behind him. "I'm afraid I can't do that, Miss Tatsunagi," Suwabe snickered as he walked closer, "The President asked me to convince you to quit the Cardfight Club and that's what I'll be doing today."
The two were in an empty classroom, with Kourin tied firmly to a chair. "So, I'll ask nicely. Will you quit the Cardfight Club?" Suwabe smiled. "No way in hell, four-eyes!" Kourin answered while struggling to get out, but it was no use. The ropes were tight. "Hmm, I guess I'll have to convince you," the vice president mockingly frowned as he walked closer to the chair Kourin was in. "There is no way you can c-" Kourin was interrupted by a loud noise. A smell that could've made the flower on the teacher's desk rot soon wafted to her. "Did you seriously just...?" the idol asked in disgust. "Yes," he answered, slowly walking backwards, "And I'll continue doing so until you are convinced."
At this point Suwabe's rank butt was right in Kourin's face. An airy one shot through, assaulting her senses. Kourin moaned in disgust as the vice president put his hand behind her head and pushed her face up his butt, trapping her nose in there. Suwabe sighed in relief as he considered what he should do to convince her next.
15522.title: Kourin

155331.content: Who will our new boy fart on?
155331.title: Taiyou

1553311.content:
"Stride Generation. Spearcross Dragon," the boy calmly said. She couldn't believe this. How could she, Rin Hashima of Team Demise, be losing to some boy?
Earlier today Rin was sent a challenge by a boy called Taiyou, who was supposedly the top in his block. If she won, "The weak will serve the strong". If he won, he would take her place in Team Demise, and have her serve him as well, which she thought there was no way that could happen. So Rin accepted the challenge, happy to be knowing she would get a new servant, like all the challengers before him.
"Spearcross Dragon, attacks," Taiyou declared. Rin shrieked as the card hit the sixth damage. She lost!? The former member of Team Demise slumped to the ground, not believing this was happening. She saw the shadows of the Dog Trainers beside her before she blacked out.
Rin slowly came to in the middle of her room. She was lying in the middle of the floor, still wet-eyed and drowsy. "I thought you'd never wake," a young voice came from above. She looked up to see Taiyou, the boy who beat her. "You're in MY room now, and you're MY servant, so don't try to fight against me, Rin-san. Now sit up." Rin slowly got up and sat on the floor. "I'm not feeling so well, so you need to help me," Taiyou said as he groaned and rubbed his stomach. What could she do to help a stomachache? Rin thought. Then the boy turned around, with his back facing her, and sighed in relief. "Much better," he said. Rin couldn't understand what was happening until a foul smell struck her. "Oh, that is just disgusting!" Rin exclaimed as she fell on her back. "The weak has no right to speak up to the strong," Taiyou grinned as he backed up and crouched down, placing his bottom right above Rin's head. "If you try to escape, I can make this much worse for you, so choose wisely, Rin-san," the boy said as a loud blast erupted from his behind. Rin had a hard time choosing between to accept these eggy fumes or trying to escape...
1553311.title: Rin Hashima

15533111.content:
"I don't know what I ate for this..." Taiyou said as a loud, squeaky one slithered out of his back door. Rin couldn't stand this but she had no choice. She was the weak now. She was now one of the people she had always looked down upon, and looked down upon is what she will get.
"Ohhhh, here's a big one!" the orange-haired boy said as he sat down on Rin's face, trapping her between his buttocks. She tried to scream but it was all blocked by his behind. Taiyou tensed up as a huge, hot storm exploded right in Rin's face! "Oh man, that was so good!" he said as he looked behind him, "Wasn't it, Rin-san?"
Rin would object to that statement if she could. This could be the foulest stench she had ever smelled in her whole life! Even that one time when Kariya ripped a long SBD on her face while sleeping was better than this! How could a small boy possibly smell this bad? Taiyou provided an answer with another loud fart, which didn't answer the question at all, but it did add to her agony. Taiyou then...
15533111.title: Just accept her fate

155331112.content:
Taiyou picked up his mobile phone and held it to his ear. "Hey man," he started, "Yeah I got her here. Wanna come over? Alright, see ya." Taiyou hummed happily as he put down his phone and promptly let out another choppy wave. "Ahh," he sighed in relief, "It is always said that it is good to bond with the strong." Rin's eyes start to water as a stinky barrage assaults her again and again.
A knock at the door. Taiyou turned his head to it and gestured, "Come on in!" It was...
155331112.title: Called some of his new "friends"
